channel.title: Command
channel.description:
Hey Does Any1 Know If Theres A Way To Make A Command That Restarts Server, so When Im Not On 1 Of My Admins Can Resart It If It Get Too Many Nulls Or Drops go Off.
like if i type ::restart
it restart my run.bat file or the voule

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @Devianz Devianz
item.description:
@Devianz wrote:

I searched for “Restart Command” and this popped right up!

else if(command.startsWith("resetserver")) { sendMessage("Server Restarting!"); Antilag.resetServer(); }

Use the search button!

Read full topic
